Represents an entry for a user in a contest.
EntryController

EntryRepository
Repository interface for managing Entry entities.
EntryService
Handle CRUD to handle Entry object with the corresponding JPA Repository
Evaluation
Represents an evaluation of a recipe by a user in a contest entry.
EvaluationController
REST controller for managing evaluations in the application.
EvaluationRepository
Repository interface for managing Evaluation entities.
EvaluationService
Service class responsible for managing evaluations.

Interface with all the methods implemented in ContestService

Interface with all the methods implemented in EntryService
